metadata.title: CVE-2021-41752 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stack overflow vulnerability in Jerryscript before commite1ce7dd7271288be8c0c8136eea9107df73a8ce2 on Oct 20, 2021 due to anunbounded recursive call to the new opt() function.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
